info.name: GPTZero integration
info.description:
Nextcloud GPTZero integration to detect AI-generated content
It allows to send text or files to GPTZero API and detect if the content is generated by an AI.
## GPTZero results
Possible results are: * Most likely written by a Human * May include parts written by an AI * Partially based on input or other sources. Unknown really * Most likely generated by an AI
Formula to detect generated content is: ``` if X < completely_generated_prob.min: if average_generated_prob <= Y: return `Most likely written by a Human` return `May include parts written by an AI` else if X > completely_generated_prob.max: if average_generated_prob <= Y: return `May include parts written by an AI` return `Most likely generated by an AI` else: if average_generated_prob <= Y: return `Unknown really` return `May include parts written by an AI` ```
info.author: Andrey Borysenko
Alexander Piskun
